      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkWinner()
      Checks if there is a winner by checking if there is a character in the secret word that the player has not guessed
      void makeGuess(char guess)
      Plays a turn by exception checking to handle invalid input, determines if the computer is still cheating and calls the make subset method and makes the word a random word in the largest subset if it is.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<WordContainer>> makeSubsets(java.util.ArrayList<Word> currentList, char guess)
      Finds all possible permutations where the guess is located and places all of them into ArrayLists accordingly and then returns an ArrayList of all the ArrayLists

      Prints the letters already guessed

    • Method Detail

      • makeSubsets

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<WordContainer>> makeSubsets(java.util.ArrayList<Word> currentList,
                                                                            char guess)
        Finds all possible permutations where the guess is located and places all of them into ArrayLists accordingly and then returns an ArrayList of all the ArrayLists
        Parameters:
        currentList - the current word list available
        guess - the guessed character
        Returns:
        ArrayList of all ArrayList subsets

      • makeGuess

        public void makeGuess(char guess)
               throws InvalidGuessException,
                      WinnerException
        Plays a turn by exception checking to handle invalid input, determines if the computer is still cheating and calls the make subset method and makes the word a random word in the largest subset if it is. Otherwise, it skips this and checks if the char is in the word
        Parameters:
        guess - the character that the player is guessing
        Throws:
        InvalidGuessException - gets thrown if the input is invalid or is already guessed
        WinnerException - gets thrown if the player has won

      • printOutcome

        public void printOutcome()
        Prints the letters already guessed

      • checkWinner

        public void checkWinner()
                 throws WinnerException
        Checks if there is a winner by checking if there is a character in the secret word that the player has not guessed
        Throws:
        WinnerException - thrown if the player has guessed every letter in the word
